review_data.title: Bon restaurant végétarien
review_data.content: Beaucoup de saveurs différentes qui changent tous les jours. Accueil sympathique. Prix abordable pour Zurich.

review_data.title: A Good Vegetarian Buffet
review_data.content: Tibits is a reasonably priced buffet-style restaurant with dozens of possiblities. Food is charged by weight -- they put your plate on a scale. Everything available is meatless.

review_data.title: A Wonderful & Healthy Vegetarian Lunch

review_data.title: Kreatives Essvergnügen

review_data.title: At last, fresh, tempting vegetarian food!
review_data.content: Until now, I would never consider visiting a ‘salad bar’ concept restaurant, but tibits is different. review_data.title: Best vegetarian restaurant (so far)!

review_data.title: Fantastic find for vegetarians
review_data.content: Thoroughly recommend this restaurant for trying lots of different vegetarian and vegan food. Pay by weight. Wish we had longer there to add a dessert. Had trouble finding it as on first floor in station complex but worth it

review_data.title: Delicious, healthy food.
review_data.content: Went for the lunch buffet today and was pleasantly surprised by the range of foods available. Nicely mixed and flavored options and as a non-vegetarian I have to say I really, really enjoyed my veggie meal. The jalapeño poppers were the highlight. Delicious.

review_data.title: Returned often

review_data.title: Good healthy food
review_data.content: We had dinner here one night - great healthy buffet selection. You pay according to weight which is pretty fair. It is a great spot for vegetarians and you can also take-away.

review_data.title: super

review_data.title: Great location near Opera House

review_data.title: Great healthy eating
review_data.content: Love the selection of fresh, healthy dishes here that you can select from an extensive buffet. The personnel are very pleasant and the atmosphere has a crisp cleanliness about it.

review_data.title: Easy to eat
review_data.content: Excellent choice of buffet foods including many vegetarian dishes. You pay by weight. Seems very popular with the locals and is open in daytime and evenings

review_data.title: Excellent choice and quality of vegetarian meals

review_data.title: This is the Vegetarian Restaurant for those in a hurry.

review_data.title: Grand veg place

review_data.title: Total lack of flexibility / business acumen!

review_data.title: Healthy food sold by weight
review_data.content: You hardly realise you are in a vegetarian restaurant - the food is so good. Queue - fill your plate from buffet and pay by weight. Extremely good value.

review_data.title: We looooved it!

review_data.title: Great vegan / vegetarian restaurant
review_data.content: Tibits is not just a great place for vegans, vegetarians, all kind of special needs (gluten, no milk, no nuts, ... whatever) the food is in general really good. It's self-service. Don't miss the sweets! London cheesecake there is best

review_data.title: Great selection of vegetarian dishes

review_data.title: Good selection with more reasonable prices than many other restaurants

review_data.title: Fantastic for vegetarians

review_data.title: Good Vegetarian Buffet

review_data.title: With family, friends or just for a quick bite - a great place

review_data.title: Vorzügliches vegetarisches Essen

review_data.title: Great for Breakfast!
review_data.content: Great for a reasonably priced breakfast in a city that isn't cheap. Food is arranged on a buffet table and you choose what and how much you want. You pay by the weight.
